name: The Man in the Park
description:
You see a man in the park on your walk home. Will you help him?

This is a short PSX-style Horror game I made to dip my toes into Godot. I hope you enjoy it! You can follow me here or on Twitter to keep up with my projects.

Controls:
Move: WASD
Sprint: L SHIFT
Interact: E
Menu: ESC

Assets:

  • Playground
  • Classical Street Elements
  • Scream Audio
  • All other assets modeled by me in Blender
  • Shaders from Godot PSX Style Demo by MenacingMecha (itch.io)
